description: A black and white photo looking down at an angle on a gumball machine. The glass sphere of the machine starts at the upper corners of the frame and curves in and down to just below the middle of the frame. It contains a full assortment of gumballs ranging in shades from black to white. The reflection of a window shows in the glass at the top toward the left side. A logo with a crown and the words "DUBBLE BUBBLE" in all caps is visible on a few of the gumballs including the one most prominent in the center of the collection. Below the glass sphere is the coin mechanism. It's a dark shade that tapers in slightly and it descends below the glass sphere. A black circle with white text of the number twenty-five is in the middle of the coin mechanism stand. It's slightly out of focus due to the depth of field. Below it is the hand knob for turning a coin into the machine to get a gumball.
